title: ‘Joe Biden’ has been dominating a niche fighting game for years
description: In fighting game series “Guilty Gear,” Joe Biden has been striking fear into the hearts of his rivals.

title: Amazon stock plummets on gloomier holiday season forecast
description: Amazon's stock fell more than 20 percent in after-hours trading Thursday.

title: Expect more China-related tech crackdowns, U.S. official says
description: Weeks after enacting the strictest curbs yet on technology exports to China, the U.S. official overseeing the measures suggested they could soon get tougher, as his team pursues support from allied nations and considers additional technology to regulate.

title: Big rocks slam into Mars, gouge craters, reveal subsurface features
description: This was the biggest crater-forming impact on one of the rocky inner planets of the solar system ever documented in real time.

title: Meet Catalyst, the new techno witch coming to ‘Apex Legends: Eclipse’
description: Catalyst will be playable when Season 15 of "Apex Legends," titled "Eclipse," launches Nov. 1. She is the first trans woman to join the cast.

title: Big Tech is failing to fight election lies, civil rights groups charge
description: A coalition of 60 civil rights and consumer groups backed a report that offers a dim assessment on tech companies’ plans to protect the 2022 midterms

title: Samsung appoints former convict and heir Lee Jae-yong as chairman
description: Samsung said it had appointed Lee Jae-yong, who was jailed for bribing South Korea’s former president, due to the "uncertain global business environment."

title: Twitter was already scrambling for the midterms. Now comes Musk.
description: The social media firm’s attempts to rein in election misinformation could collide with its new owner’s “free speech” vision just before election day.

title: How to track your ballot online
description: Want to make sure your vote counts? Now if you vote by mail, you can follow your ballot’s every move like a UPS package.

title: This chip transmits an internet’s worth of data every second
description: The laser-powered chip could mean faster broadband speeds for consumers and an internet that requires less electricity to run.

title: Inside the Dem’s elaborate attempt to woo TikTok influencers
description: The creators with a combined following of 58 million on the app met with President Biden and former president Barack Obama.
